doc.name: browserNewUrlWindow
doc.summary: Sent when a url has been opened in a new window.

examples.example:
on browserNewUrlWindow pInstanceId, pUrl
go stack (the owner of me)
end browserNewUrlWindow

description.p: The browserNewUrlWindow message is sent to the current card of a stack containing a browser object when the browser object has opened a url in a new window.
The url is the url that has opened in a new window
The instanceId is the integer identifier of the browser object
Note: For general information on using the browser library, see the notes in the revBrowserOpen function reference.
